title: Really?
body:
Is sated finally getting that dreaded nerf (maybe not so dreaded for some)?

Do these faces look familiar(/similar)?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/8hhT41YP-champion-concept-dhama-the-force-of-balance

Is riot really finally using a design based off a players concept art?

replies.body: For people like Yi, udyr and shyvanna its a slight annoyance. I think it was to curb the fact that everyone was getting devourer when they should have been going for warrior, which is why they buffed warrior.
